body:
> I'm kind of assuming the tests are just being split up and are otherwise identical. Please let me know if there's anything there that I should look at in more detail.

Lots of them were just moved around, but new tests added include:

- [A test for ClientEnvironment.country and ClientEnvironment.request_time](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/557/files#diff-6569b73c5da8d51f3dc3f86ce37be38aR50)
- [ClientEnvironment.doNotTrack tests](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/557/files#diff-6569b73c5da8d51f3dc3f86ce37be38aR80)
- [A very small test of filter expression context working correctly](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/557/files#diff-e39c5a109140b65f857b784ce9b4c5bdR53)
- [Tests for properties we expect to be in the filter expression context when checking recipes, and a basic test of how executing a filter expression casts the return value and handles errors](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/557/files#diff-6169d799c871e62ee7841b8112cee917R89)
body_text:
I'm kind of assuming the tests are just being split up and are otherwise identical. Please let me know if there's anything there that I should look at in more detail.

Lots of them were just moved around, but new tests added include:

A test for ClientEnvironment.country and ClientEnvironment.request_time
ClientEnvironment.doNotTrack tests
A very small test of filter expression context working correctly
Tests for properties we expect to be in the filter expression context when checking recipes, and a basic test of how executing a filter expression casts the return value and handles errors
body_html:
I'm kind of assuming the tests are just being split up and are otherwise identical. Please let me know if there's anything there that I should look at in more detail.

Lots of them were just moved around, but new tests added include:

  • A test for ClientEnvironment.country and ClientEnvironment.request_time
  • ClientEnvironment.doNotTrack tests
  • A very small test of filter expression context working correctly
  • Tests for properties we expect to be in the filter expression context when checking recipes, and a basic test of how executing a filter expression casts the return value and handles errors
